languages.text: "Моя любимица. Она караулит кревециусов — и периодически получает от меня надбавку за службу. В виде косточек алцедонта".

traits.locale_text: "Моя любимица. Она караулит кревециусов — и периодически получает от меня надбавку за службу. В виде косточек алцедонта".

languages.text: "My darling pet. She is guarding the shrimperiuses. Every once in a while, she gets an allowance in the form of alcedont bones."
languages.original_text: "Моя любимица. Она караулит кревециусов — и периодически получает от меня надбавку за службу. В виде косточек алцедонта".

traits.locale_text: "My darling pet. She is guarding the shrimperiuses, and once in a while gets an allowance in the form of alcedont bones."
"My darling pet. She is guarding the shrimperiuses, and once in a while gets an allowance in the form of alcedont bones."
"My darling pet. She is guarding the shrimperiuses. Every once in a while, she gets a allowance in the form of alcedont bones."
"My darling pet. She is guarding the shrimperiuses. Every once in a while, she gets a allowance in the form of alcedont bones."
"My darling pet. She is guarding the shrimperiuses. Every once in a while, she gets an allowance in the form of alcedont bones."
"My darling pet. She is guarding the shrimperiuses. Every once in a while, she gets an allowance in the form of alcedont bones."

languages.text: “是我亲爱的小宠物，她负责看守五尾虾。每隔一段时间，我都会给她一点点小小的奖励，也就是角兽的骨头。”
languages.original_text: "My darling pet. She is guarding the shrimperiuses. Every once in a while, she gets an allowance in the form of alcedont bones."

traits.locale_text: “是我亲爱的小宠物，她负责看守五尾虾。每隔一段时间，我都会给她一点点小小的奖励，也就是角兽的骨头。”

languages.text: «Mi querida mascota. Está custodiando los gamboides. De vez en cuando le doy unos huesos de alcedonte como premio».
languages.original_text: "My darling pet. She is guarding the shrimperiuses. Every once in a while, she gets an allowance in the form of alcedont bones."

traits.locale_text: «Mi querida mascota. Está custodiando los gamboides. De vez en cuando le doy unos huesos de alcedonte como premio».

languages.text: "Benim sevgili evcil hayvanım. İmparidesleri koruyor. Arada sırada da harçlık olarak alsedont kemiği yiyor."
languages.original_text: "My darling pet. She is guarding the shrimperiuses. Every once in a while, she gets an allowance in the form of alcedont bones."

traits.locale_text: "Benim sevgili evcil hayvanım. İmparidesleri koruyor. Arada sırada da harçlık olarak alsedont kemiği yiyor."

languages.text: 「私の可愛いペットです。彼女は、シュリンペリウスを守っています。時々、アルセドントの骨という形でお小遣いをもらっています」
languages.original_text: "My darling pet. She is guarding the shrimperiuses. Every once in a while, she gets an allowance in the form of alcedont bones."

traits.locale_text: 「私の可愛いペットです。彼女は、シュリンペリウスを守っています。時々、アルセドントの骨という形でお小遣いをもらっています」

languages.text: « Ma petite créature d'amour. Elle garde les crevimperius. De temps en temps, elle a droit à un os d'alcedont, en récompense. »
languages.original_text: "My darling pet. She is guarding the shrimperiuses. Every once in a while, she gets an allowance in the form of alcedont bones."

traits.locale_text: « Ma petite créature d'amour. Elle garde les crevimperius. De temps en temps, elle a droit à un os d'alcedont, en récompense. »

languages.text: "Mein geliebtes Haustier. Sie bewacht die Shrimperiusse. Hin und wieder bekommt sie zur Belohnung ein paar Alcedont-Knochen."
languages.original_text: "My darling pet. She is guarding the shrimperiuses. Every once in a while, she gets an allowance in the form of alcedont bones."

traits.locale_text: "Mein geliebtes Haustier. Sie bewacht die Shrimperiusse. Hin und wieder bekommt sie zur Belohnung ein paar Alcedont-Knochen."
